instruments.name: Fender Stratocaster
instruments.description: The Fender Stratocaster is a model of electric guitar designed in 1954 by Leo Fender, Bill Carson, George Fullerton, and Freddie Tavares. The Stratocaster is a versatile guitar, usable for most styles of music and has been used by many famous musicians over the decades.

instruments.name: Gibson Les Paul Standard
instruments.description: The Gibson Les Paul Standard delivers the signature sound of Gibson's electric guitars with a classic look. Known for its sustain and versatility, it has been a favorite among musicians for generations.

instruments.name: Martin D-28
instruments.description: Martin D-28 is an iconic acoustic guitar that offers a deep and resonant sound. Known for its superb craftsmanship and rich tones, this model has been a popular choice among professional musicians for decades.

instruments.name: Yamaha P-125 Digital Piano
instruments.description: The Yamaha P-125 is a compact digital piano that combines incredible piano performance with a user-friendly minimalistic design. Easily portable and extremely accessible, this instrument allows you to experience the joy of playing the piano on your terms.

instruments.name: Roland TD-17KVX V-Drums
instruments.description: The Roland TD-17KVX is the top-of-the-line model in the TD-17 series, offering the playability and sound of high-end V-Drums in an affordable kit. It's perfect for practicing drummers and those who want a reliable electronic kit for home recordings.

specifications.kitConfiguration: Snare, 3 Toms, Hi-Hat, 2 Crashes, Ride, Kick Pad
specifications.includedAccessories: Drum stand, AC adapter, Sound module mount

instruments.name: Korg Minilogue
instruments.description: The Korg Minilogue brings a new level of synthesis to the table with its unique sound structure and its 16-step polyphonic sequencer. Itâ€™s perfect for musicians who need a versatile synthesizer for both performance and composition.

instruments.name: Buffet Crampon R13 Clarinet
instruments.description: Known for its rich tone and professional quality, the Buffet Crampon R13 Clarinet has been a favorite among clarinetists worldwide. This model features an impeccable response and flexibility, making it a staple in symphony orchestras.

instruments.name: Pearl Export EXX
instruments.description: The Pearl Export EXX drum kit sets the standard for entry-level drum sets with its high-quality shells, sturdy hardware, and powerful sound. It's an excellent choice for new drummers looking for a reliable first kit.

specifications.configuration: 5-piece set with snare, kick, toms, and cymbals

instruments.name: Mendini by Cecilio Flute
instruments.description: The Mendini by Cecilio Flute is an excellent choice for students and beginners. Featuring a durable nickel-plated body and a split E mechanism, this flute is designed to be easy to play and maintain.

specifications.includedAccessories: Hard case, cleaning rod, cloth, and gloves

instruments.name: Squier by Fender Affinity Telecaster
instruments.description: The Squier by Fender Affinity Telecaster is known for its sharp tone and smooth playability. Ideal for beginners and intermediate players, it offers the quality and style of a Fender at an affordable price.

instruments.name: Yamaha YAS-280 Saxophone
instruments.description: The Yamaha YAS-280 Saxophone is designed with beginners and advanced students in mind, providing a reliable and consistent performance. Its responsive playability and accurate intonation make it an excellent choice for learning and progression.

specifications.includedAccessories: Case, neck strap, mouthpiece, cork grease, cleaning cloth

instruments.name: Akai Professional MPK Mini MK3
instruments.description: The Akai Professional MPK Mini MK3 is a compact, yet full-featured MIDI keyboard controller designed for musicians on the go. It includes an array of pads, knobs, and keys to unleash your creativity anywhere.
